_xResult.title: Cupid Blazer
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made velvet blazer with satin lining and a satin self-tie belt
_xResult.longdesc:
A velvet jacket is a classic piece full of style that has stayed elegant and classy, outlasting all the trends, year after year. This made to measure blazer features the darkest black velvet and will add elegance to any outfit. Choose to dress it down with jeans and a white shirt, or make it an evening wear staple with a sheer shirt and a velvet skirt. This blazer is fully lined with a satin self-tie belt.

For custom made requests, let ZaZa know your desires using the button below.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean or dry clean only.
